cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 11th Oct 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 11th Oct 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: This private ensuite room has a double bed and an ensuite bathroom

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: This private room has a queen sized bed and an ensuite bathroom.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard 4 Bed Family Room Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Spacious room has double bed along with a bunk bed. Perfect for families or groups up to 4 people. 
There is an attached ensuite.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard 6 Bed Family Room Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Spacious room has double bed along with two other bunk beds. Perfect for families or groups up to 6 people. 
There is an attached ensuite.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
